price: ߣߴߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߘߊ߲߬ ߘߊ߫ ( ߞߊ߬ ߞߍ߬ߟߍ ߓߟߏߞߊ߬ )߸ ߊߟߊ߫ ߦߋ߫ ߡߊ߬ߞߕߏ߬ߟߊ߫ ߤߌߣߟߊ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߘߌ߫
arabic: فَإِنِ ٱنتَهَوۡاْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: fa-ini intahaw fa-inna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
